EmailTemplate.description: Template para Request de supplier in approval.
EmailTemplate.name: TKD_SupplierInApproval_Request
EmailTemplate.subject: Request to approve, Supplier in approval from takedown {!Supplier_in_approval__c.TKD_rb_SupplierInApproval__r.name}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear User,
You are receiving this notification because the Takedown CP {!Takedowns_Contingency_plan__c.Name} in {!Takedowns_Contingency_plan__c.TKD_ls_takedown_stage__c} stage is waiting for Approval.
If you want to see the record in Salesforce, click here .
Regards, Engen Capital.
